system.Text:
When __you check to see if you have a specific helpful item__, and you have at least +1 supply, roll +supply.

On a __strong hit__, you have it. Take +1 momentum.

On a __weak hit__, you have it, but your resources are diminished. Take +1 momentum and suffer -1 supply.

On a __miss__, you don’t have it and the situation grows more perilous. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.

Trigger.Text: When you check to see if you have a specific helpful item, and you have at least +1 supply...

Strong Hit.Text: On a __strong hit__, you have it. Take +1 momentum.

Weak Hit.Text: On a __weak hit__, you have it, but your resources are diminished. Take +1 momentum and suffer -1 supply.

Miss.Text: On a __miss__, you don’t have it and the situation grows more perilous. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.
